s.text: In a time of legislative budget cuts, every dollar helps to fund student programs and scholarships.
Our alumni records show that we have 184 graduates directly employed by matching gift companies.
Our alumni records show that we have 184 graduates directly employed by matching gift companies.
In a time of legislative budget cuts, every dollar helps to fund student programs and scholarships.
Don't forget, too, that in many cases subsidiaries of larger parent companies are also eligible and that companies will sometimes match a gift retroactively.
When you make your contribution to the law school in 1992, please take a moment to follow the three easy steps listed above.
It only takes three quick, easy steps to obtain a matching gift from your (or your spouse's) employer to enhance your donation to the Indiana University School of Law -Indianapolis.
